src:
Tajam di Inter Milan, Romelu Lukaku Samai Catatan Ronaldo
03 Nov 2019, 20:48 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Romelu Lukaku langsung berhasil menunjukkan kualitasnya di musim pertamanya bersama Inter Milan. Lukaku kini bahkan berhasil menyamai catatan bomber legendaris Nerazzurri, Ronaldo.
Lukaku meneruskan tren positifnya dengan memborong dua gol dalam kemenangan 2-1 yang diraih Inter Milan di markas Bologna, Minggu (3/11/2019) dini hari tadi.
Dalam laga ini, Inter sempat tertinggal lebih dulu hingga menit ke-72 ketika Lukaku sukses menggetarkan gawang tuan rumah. Lukaku pun kemudian menentukan kemenangan La Beneamata lewat eksekusi penalti pada masa injury time.
text:
Sharp at Inter Milan, Romelu Lukaku Samai Note Ronaldo
03 Nov 2019, 20:48 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Romelu Lukaku immediately managed to show its quality in his first season with Inter Milan. Lukaku now even managed to match the record of the legendary Nerazzurri bomber, Ronaldo.
Lukaku continued his positive trend by buying up two goals in the 2-1 victory won by Inter Milan at Bologna headquarters on Sunday (3/11/2019) early this morning.
In this fight, Inter had left behind until the 72nd minute when Lukaku successfully shook the home goal. Lukaku then determined the victory of La Beneamata through penalty execution during injury time.
